How pathetic...\""},{"lineNumber":5953,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイは、踵を返す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rei turned on his heel."},{"lineNumber":5954,"originalJapaneseLine":"行き先は、闘神都市の奥深く、コアブロック。","translatedEnglishLine":"His destination was deep within the Fighting God City, the Core Block."},{"lineNumber":5955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待て…………待て、レイ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait... Wait, Rei!!\""},{"lineNumber":5956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいらは…………おいらを、ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... I... myself...!\""},{"lineNumber":5957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うあああああああああぁぁぁぁぁぁっ……！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh...!!\""},{"lineNumber":5958,"originalJapaneseLine":"その日。","translatedEnglishLine":"That day."},{"lineNumber":5959,"originalJapaneseLine":"闘神都市Σは、墜ちた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Fighting God City Σ fell."},{"lineNumber":5960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..........\""},{"lineNumber":5961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..........\""},{"lineNumber":5962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よォ。大変そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey. Looks like things are tough.\""},{"lineNumber":5963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっちもね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Same to you.\""},{"lineNumber":5964,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけ交わして、二人はすれ違っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They exchanged only those words as they passed by each other."},{"lineNumber":5965,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっと、見つかっちまったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops, I got found out."},{"lineNumber":5966,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたも物好きだねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're quite the curious one yourself.\""},{"lineNumber":5967,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やっほ、ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":5968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、コパンドンか。どうかしたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm, Copandon? What's up?\""},{"lineNumber":5969,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの許に、コパンドンがやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon came over to Rance."},{"lineNumber":5970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、おもろいポピンズ見つけたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, I found some interesting Popinz,"},{"lineNumber":5971,"originalJapaneseLine":"　部下にどうかなーって」","translatedEnglishLine":"thought maybe they'd make good subordinates.\""},{"lineNumber":5972,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ポピンズ……チビ助どもか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Popinz... little ones, huh."},{"lineNumber":5973,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あいつら、小さいからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"They're small after all..."},{"lineNumber":5974,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いまいち旨みがないというか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's hard to get much out of them...\""},{"lineNumber":5975,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、でも有能やねんて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, but they're supposed to be capable."},{"lineNumber":5976,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほら、挨拶し。これが――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, say hello. This is---\""},{"lineNumber":5977,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、コパンドンが背後を仰いだ先には――","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon looked behind him and ---"},{"lineNumber":5978,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰もいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"No one was there."},{"lineNumber":5979,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？　なんだ、透明人間か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hm? What's this, an invisible person?\""},{"lineNumber":5980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クレインやあるまいし……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not like he's Crane or anything..."},{"lineNumber":5981,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれ。どっか行ってもうたかなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm. Did he go somewhere already, I wonder?\""},{"lineNumber":5982,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこかわざとらしく、コパンドンは","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhat exaggeratedly, Copandon"},{"lineNumber":5983,"originalJapaneseLine":"きょろきょろと周囲を見渡した。","translatedEnglishLine":"looked around nervously."},{"lineNumber":5984,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っても、誰もいないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But still, there's no one here."},{"lineNumber":5985,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おおかた、飽きて帰ったんじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Most likely, they got bored and left...\""},{"lineNumber":5986,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスもつられて立ち上がり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance also stood up along with him,"},{"lineNumber":5987,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋の中を軽く見回すが、気配もない。","translatedEnglishLine":"and quickly looked around the room, but there was no sign."},{"lineNumber":5988,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、おっかしいなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm, that's strange."},{"lineNumber":5989,"originalJapaneseLine":"　士官する気は満々や言うてたのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He said he was eager to become an officer...\""},{"lineNumber":5990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、どうでもいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, whatever."},{"lineNumber":5991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オスだかメスだか知らんが、セックスも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't even care about whether it's male or female, or sex...\""},{"lineNumber":5992,"originalJapaneseLine":"興味を失って再び玉座に戻り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Losing interest, he returned to the throne again,"},{"lineNumber":5993,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは腰を下ろして……","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rance sat down..."},{"lineNumber":5994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐはああああぁぁぁ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaaahhh!?!\""},{"lineNumber":5995,"originalJapaneseLine":"肛門を貫かれて、悶絶して床に転がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Pierced through the anus, he writhed in agony and fell to the floor."},{"lineNumber":5996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かはっ……な、なにやつ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kah... Wh-who is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":5997,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アレルギー超大国のイタズラキング、アスベスト」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The prank king of the allergy superpower, Asbestos.\""},{"lineNumber":5998,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人のポピンズが、両手を組んだ指を","translatedEnglishLine":"One Popinz clasped his fingers together,"},{"lineNumber":5999,"originalJapaneseLine":"上に向けたまま、ニヒルに笑った。","translatedEnglishLine":"pointed them upwards, and smiled nihilistically."},{"lineNumber":6000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回は俺の勝ちだな、総統さんよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This time, I win, General.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。改造が間に合わなかったとか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph. Saying the modifications weren't ready on time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなシラける話なら、一気に潰して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if it's such a disappointing excuse, I'll crush you all at once..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 短い呟きは、わずかに裏切られたような、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The short mutter sounded faintly betrayed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな響きがあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It carried that kind of tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「き……たか、レイ……っ……」
半壊した闘神の身体は立ち上がろうとして果たせず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The half-destroyed Fighting God’s body tried to stand but failed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも膝を支えにしてレイに向かって構える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: still using his knees to support himself, he prepared to face Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さぁ来いっ……おいらは……まだまだやれるっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come at me... I... can still fight...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新兵器、がっ……」
「…………けっ。くだらねェ……」
レイは、踵を返す。
行き先は、闘神都市の奥深く、コアブロック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His destination was deep within the Fighting God City, the Core Block.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て…………待て、レイ！！」
「おいらは…………おいらを、ッ……！」
「うあああああああああぁぁぁぁぁぁっ……！！」
その日。
闘神都市Σは、墜ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Fighting God City Σ fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よォ。大変そうだな」
「そっちもね」
それだけ交わして、二人はすれ違っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They exchanged only those words as they passed by each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと、見つかっちまったか。
あんたも物好きだねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're quite the curious one yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっほ、ランス」
「ん、コパンドンか。どうかしたか？」
ランスの許に、コパンドンがやってきた。
「や、おもろいポピンズ見つけたから、
部下にどうかなーって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thought maybe they'd make good subordinates."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポピンズ……チビ助どもか。
あいつら、小さいからな……
いまいち旨みがないというか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's hard to get much out of them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、でも有能やねんて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, but they're supposed to be capable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほら、挨拶し。これが――――」
と、コパンドンが背後を仰いだ先には――
誰もいない。
「…………ん？　なんだ、透明人間か？」
「クレインやあるまいし……
あれ。どっか行ってもうたかなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm. Did he go somewhere already, I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかわざとらしく、コパンドンは
きょろきょろと周囲を見渡した。
「っても、誰もいないぞ。
おおかた、飽きて帰ったんじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most likely, they got bored and left..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもつられて立ち上がり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance also stood up along with him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部屋の中を軽く見回すが、気配もない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and quickly looked around the room, but there was no sign.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、おっかしいなー。
士官する気は満々や言うてたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was eager to become an officer..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、どうでもいい。
オスだかメスだか知らんが、セックスも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't even care about whether it's male or female, or sex..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味を失って再び玉座に戻り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing interest, he returned to the throne again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは腰を下ろして……
「ぐはああああぁぁぁ！？」
肛門を貫かれて、悶絶して床に転がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pierced through the anus, he writhed in agony and fell to the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かはっ……な、なにやつ……」
「アレルギー超大国のイタズラキング、アスベスト」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The prank king of the allergy superpower, Asbestos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人のポピンズが、両手を組んだ指を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One Popinz clasped his fingers together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上に向けたまま、ニヒルに笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pointed them upwards, and smiled nihilistically.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は俺の勝ちだな、総統さんよ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said he was eager to become an officer..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、どうでもいい。
オスだかメスだか知らんが、セックスも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't even care about whether it's male or female, or sex..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興味を失って再び玉座に戻り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Losing interest, he returned to the throne again,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは腰を下ろして……
「ぐはああああぁぁぁ！？」
肛門を貫かれて、悶絶して床に転がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pierced through the anus, he writhed in agony and fell to the floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かはっ……な、なにやつ……」
「アレルギー超大国のイタズラキング、アスベスト」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The prank king of the allergy superpower, Asbestos."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人のポピンズが、両手を組んだ指を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One Popinz clasped his fingers together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上に向けたまま、ニヒルに笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: pointed them upwards, and smiled nihilistically.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は俺の勝ちだな、総統さんよ」
